feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • for eXense-auth: Update ru.json (issue#1703) by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1710
  • Update bs.json by @Erudaro in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1720
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1725
  • Attempt bugfix for error when on VPN (#1120)
  • Translation fixes (#1699)
  • GitHub search bugfix (#1705)
  • Fix missing trailing slash for path-less URLs (#1715)
  • Rename Codeberg to Forgejo (#1722)
  • Rename "Version String Extraction" to "Trim Version String" for non-HTML Sources (#1723)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.13...v1.1.14

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change the font (support for more languages) by @VladWinner in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1749
  • Update ja.json by @bluefly000 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1746
  • translate: update turkish by @asandikci in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1748
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1755
  • Update GitLab for new uploads URL scheme (#1742)
  • Ability to share selective exports (#1752)

New Contributors

  • @VladWinner made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1749
  • @asandikci made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1748

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.14...v1.1.15

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • French translation completely revised by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1771
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1770
  • APKPure: Filter releases by available architecture (#598)
  • Use a more obvious icon (magnifying glass) for the "filter apps" button (#1762)

New Contributors

  • @Kevinr99089 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1771

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.15...v1.1.16

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updating certain words (French File) by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1773
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1774:
  • Fix bug introduced in v1.1.16: APKPure fails to find universal APKs
  • Fix bugs found in APKPure URL matching

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.16...v1.1.17

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • APKPure bugfix: Correctly extract APKs that are multi-arch but not universal by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1777

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.17...v1.1.18
